title: Where shall I learn artificial intelligence in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science are some of the latest fields wherein you can find a lot of job opportunities. So, if you are trying to make a career then this is the right time for this. If you are looking out for a training institute in AI, then there are a lot of training platforms that you can find be it online, offline, or self-studying mediums. Whichever training institute you are looking for you just have to go through a few parameters and be opting for one. You can go through this: On which parameters, We should compare different training institute for data science? One of the training platforms that I would like to recommend is Learnbay. Learnbay offers IBM Certified Artificial Intelligence Programs. These are the AI programs offered by Learnbay: Data Science and AI Certification: This is a course that is specifically designed for the ones having 1 to 5 yrs of work experience. This course features in getting trained in programming languages, Statistics, ML Algorithms, and other analytics and visualization tools. AI and ML Certification: This course is specifically designed for the ones having more than 5+ years of experience. This course gives you knowledge in deep learning, computer vision. So, if you are planning to go for higher studies that I would suggest that you can opt for this course to get familiar with the basics of Artificial Intelligence. Data Science and AI for Managers and Leaders: This course is specifically designed for the ones having 9+ years of work experience. This is designed for the ones who want to pursue their career in Data Science Managerial roles. This course gives you in-depth knowledge that will give you more exposure to coding, programming.

Artificial Intelligence, probably the most sought after term in the 21st century. Right from its inception till today, AI has been showing immense progress every single day. From being a convoluted concept all the way till it becoming one of the most trending technology, it has made a strong impact in today’s world. If you are planning to be one among the superheroes in the world of AI, then make sure you keep a structured path to your learning. Artificial Intelligence calls for all things technical. Be it programming languages like Python or R, data handling with respect to distributed computing using Spark or even scaling everything to the clouds using AWS or Azure. There are many programs online which are very well put together to help you master Artificial Intelligence. For example in India, we have many top certification providers. Intellipaat, in my opinion is the one leading here. Their carefully put together curriculum alongside structured teaching, 24/7 support and lifetime access are the highlights. Let us discuss the course program, they seem to cover everything from the basics of AI, neural networks, deep learning all the way to concepts in depth about neural networks, Keras, autoencoders and even concepts such as Time Series Analysis (TSA) I think this is very well put together for you to pick up on the technologies and learn. Here’s a free video from them covering a bit about Artificial Intelligence. Check it out:  Do check them out, they have really good reviews. Have fun learning :)

Instead of jumping right into learning artificial intelligence, make sure you have considered the question “what should i learn in artificial intelligence?” before “where shall i learn artificial intelligence?” You have 2 choice:1) Online self-learning platform: if you can spend a few focused hours per day for months and ready to get your hands-on with learning complex subjects - then only you go for on-line courses. Caution is that most people end up feeding their mind with piles of information which could be irrelevant in the market. 2) Formal education: nothing can beat quality education from some premium institute. Sniffer Search is best Artificial Intelligence training company . We do have extensive research on new A.I algorithm . With Single course ,you are getting all round practical knowledge on Artificial Intelligence(Data Science with M.L , Deep Learning ,Speech to Text,Face Detection and Object Detection, Google API ,Chatbot and Applciation development with A.I) Project work: Real time work on LSTM model to develop chatbot,Text generaton model prototype Work with Real time Camera for Object Detection Work with M.L project like prediction on Satellite data,Sales of Zomato ,English Premiere league etc. Duration: 3 month A.I course:33K 6 month course+real time project: 60 K Job guaranteed course for 2+years experience /Freshers with 80 percent score in B.E passout :2018 More details: Artificial Intelligence course in Bangalore Advantage: Taught by Architect to build your knowledge as developer ,Data Scientist and Deep learning EngineerAssignment on each topic to excel your skillsCaption Project(6 numbers)Real time Project(1 Nos)Resume Building and prepare for latest job opening3 month course

Coding Elements has many courses related to AI. You can check them out. Coding Elements is a programming institute that has trained thousands of students from all over. There are courses in Machine Learning and Deep Learning, Python Programming, Data Science and many others. About The Courses: 1.	The courses have many real-world projects that you can work on and add to your portfolio. 2.	The courses are designed to also help you with interview preparation. You will solve many curated practice questions that will help you tremendously during interviews. 3.	The courses can be taken along with your studies/job and is flexible. The course access period is 4 years. 4.	They are certificate courses and you can add the certificate to your professional profile on successful completion. 5.	The courses have a lot of practice questions (hundreds of them) that are commonly asked in interviews. Working on them helps you prepare for interviews and jobs. AI is growing at a very rapid pace. In the coming years, many jobs will be done by AI. There is a dire need for skilled professionals in AI. This is a good time to upskill and gain experience in it. https://www.codingelements.com/

The best place to learn online at your own pace or along with live instructors. The faculty seems to be very technically sound in their subject and bring a lot of real-life scenarios during the sessions which makes it very easy to relate. Evarcity has lot of new technologies courses which are difficult to learn by one self. It helps one to keep abreast with latest and newer technologies. The courses are well structured right from installation documents, videos, PowerPoint,exercises and assignment.At the end of each course, the quiz helps you to determine your understanding about the subject too.They can improve upon many more sample projects for newer technologieswhich can help the individuals with ideas on where all they can leverage it.Good thing about the course is that it is available to you for life time, you can always return and also request for refresher courses. Also am planning to leverage the 24x7 Expert Help to resolve any technical bottlenecks related to the courses which I have taken. Keep up the good work Evarcity Team number 8105901208 www.evarcity.com
